articles.description: Wayne Rooney holds a record at Man Utd that he doesn't expect to be beaten for a long time, which could serve as a challenge to the current squad.
articles.content: It took 44 years for a Manchester United player to break the goalscoring record Sir Bobby Charlton had set, his 249 goals for the club setting a benchmark that proved impossible for every brilliant forward that had graced Old Trafford until Wayne Rooney's com… [+3630 chars]

articles.title: Agustin Pichot will push for British and Irish Lions to play in the Americas - Daily Mail
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Pichot wants the Lions to travel to new destinations - as well as Australia, New Zealand and South Africa as part of his vision to globalise the sport if he is elected World Rugby chairman.
articles.content:
The British and Irish Lions could tour the Americas as part of Agustin Pichot's vision to globalise the sport if he is elected World Rugby chairman.
Pichot wants the Lions to travel to new destinations as well as the traditional territories of Australia, New… [+1838 chars]

articles.content:
